appName.description: The name of the browser extension

appDescription.message: Transform your clipboard management with Cliproard. Quickly store and access saved items to streamline your workflow and boost your productivity.

manageButton.description: Text displayed on the Manage button

titleItems.description: Title for the ClipRoard items section

contentLabel.description: Label for the content input field

aliasLabel.description: Label for the alias input field

contentPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the content input field

aliasPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the alias input field

addButton.description: Text displayed on the Add button

cleanButton.description: Text displayed on the Clear all button

deleteButton.description: Text displayed on the Delete button

titleSettings.description: Title for the ClipRoard settings section

labelVisibleItems.description: Label for the number of visible items setting

noItems.description: Message displayed when there are no items registered

optionsTitle.description: Title displayed in options page tab
